card_text: Cannot be destroyed by card effects while you control a Fusion Monster. You can only use each of the following effects of "Dragonmaid Nudyarl" once per turn.$N●You can discard this card, then target 1 monster in either GY; shuffle it into the Deck.$N●At the end of the Battle Phase: You can return this card to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Level 2 "Dragonmaid" monster from your hand.
